com.asdf.ssjava.world
Class Level

java.lang.Object
  com.asdf.ssjava.world.Level

public class Level
extends java.lang.Object

The level object containing all data for a specific level.

Author:
Jeremy Brown

Constructor Detail

Level

public Level()
Default Constructor. Initializes all arrays of entities and messages. Sets default values for the level end point, the background and the level code.
